title: Pakkam Vanthu Lyrics Kaththi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song:Pakkam Vanthu - Kaththi
Singer:Anirudh, Hip Hop Tamilan Adhi
Movie:Kaththi,
Music:Anirudh,

you know what
guess this back
we are back baby

ah penne paar
ah oru muttam thaali
ah en pakkam vaa
ah enai anaithida vaa
ah penne ottrai muththam podhumaa
illai latcham muththam vendumaa
adi ennavendru solluma

en nenjam thudikkudhu
unnai nenaithida
kaigal pidiththida
manasadhu thudikkudhu
unmai thaan
paithiyam pidikkudhu
vaithiyam paarthidu
ennai nee konjam thottu paar

penne endhan ulagam neethaan
naan andha nilavai suttrivaravaa
unnai ..
muththam ondrai thandhu vittaal
mukthi adaivaai

vinmeen thaan adhu
kaadhal thaan kondadhu pole
naan unmeedhu kondidavaa
unnai muththangal ittu
pin vetkathil vittuthaan
manjathil konjithaan vendridavaa

unnai paarthaale podhumey
aayiram jenmangal meendum
pirandhonnai serndhiduven

ennai paakkaamal pogaadhey
nenjamthaan thaangaadhey
ullangayil unnai thaangiduven

DANCE..
Pakkaam vandhu konjam
Pakkaam vandhu konjam
Pakkaam vandhu konjam
Pakkaam vandhu konjam
muththangal thaa

penne endhan kannai paar
ulle latcham vennila
undhan kangal ennai kandhadhum
latchangal kodiyaai marudhammaa
adi ponadhu pogattum
kaayangal aarattum
eppodhum naan unnai kanavil pakka
aasaigal vandhidum aanandham thandhidum
indru mudhal indha paattai nee ketka

mugaththil irukku sirippu
aana ullukkul edhukku morappu
adi agaththin azhagu mugaththil theriyum
idhuthaan ennoda karuththu

enthaan neeyum paarkka
aasaigal vandhu ennai thaakka
meendum naan unnaye paakka
kadhal vandhu nenjam malarndhadhey
ulagam marandhadhye
ah unnaal pudhidhaai pirandhadhey
adi yen ippadi nigalndhadhu
iru uyir ondraai kalandhadhu

adiye ippo yen sirithaai
idhayam sattena nee pariththaai
unmai mattum endhan nenjam
ninaithidudhey

Maname maname oru
ponna thaedi naan tholanjen
maname  maname
unna kaadhalaala naan karanjen

Pakkaam vandhu konjam
muththangal thaa
Pakkaam vandhu konjam
muththangal thaa
Pakkaam vandhu konjam
muththangal thaa
